SEARCH
Package com.example.eventbooking

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventbooking.User
public class User extends Object
The User class where we are storing the data and is the main model for User. Instances of firebase related to User go through this where we load based on the document ID and pass data through here to be updated.
Since:
2024-11-04

    • generateProfileBitmap

      public android.graphics.Bitmap generateProfileBitmap(String name)
      Generates a circular bitmap with a single letter in the center. The letter is the first character of the provided name, or "A" if the name is empty. The bitmap is randomly colored for visual uniqueness.
      Parameters:
      name - The name from which to extract the first letter for the profile picture.
      Returns:
      A 100x100 pixel circular bitmap with the initial letter in the center.

    • defaultProfilePictureUrl

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> defaultProfilePictureUrl(String name)
      Generates a profile picture, compresses it to a PNG format, and initiates its upload to Firebase Storage. After successful upload, the Firebase Storage URL will be saved in Firestore as the profile picture URL.
      Parameters:
      name - The name from which to generate the profile picture with the first letter.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating that profile picture generation and upload have been initiated.

    • uploadDefaultImageToFirebaseStorage

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> uploadDefaultImageToFirebaseStorage(byte[] imageBytes)
      Uploads an image byte array to Firebase Storage and retrieves the download URL upon successful upload. The URL is then saved as the profile picture URL in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      imageBytes - The byte array of the image to upload.

    • saveUserDataToFirestore

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> saveUserDataToFirestore()
      Task to save the given user to firebase, take in all associated values and put them in a map which will then be saved as a collective document, firebase handles the direct mapping so long as the fields names match.

      It saves it to the Users collection inside of firebase

    • saveUserDataToFirestore

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> saveUserDataToFirestore(User.OnUserIDGenerated callback)

    • uploadImage

      public void uploadImage(android.net.Uri imageUri)
      The core aspect of this function uploadProfilePictureToFirebase is to get a picture to upload Then given that picture that was uploaded we get the link reference to firebase storage. This link is saved to the user so then when calling the users profile it calls this new link instead.

    • saveGeneratedImageUrl

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> saveGeneratedImageUrl(String imageURL)
      Saving the generated image url to the user and updating the firebase
      Parameters:
      imageURL -

      public void deleteSelectedImageFromFirebase(String imageUrl)

    • isDefaultURLMain

      public boolean isDefaultURLMain()
      Checking to see if there is another URL for the user or not
      Returns:
      true boolean if the default URL is the main one

    • setMainToDefault

      public void setMainToDefault()
      Setting the called upon profile picture URL to the default
